page.title: 09EDGMOND FAMILIES
page.content: In{15}families interviewed 2 adults lecture in Agriculture, 1 is a crop consultant, 5 teach at Newport schools 13 work outside the area including a company director in Wolverhampton, 1 engineer in Stafford, 1 in Hong Kong. Cars are 1 or 2 per family, young people use bicycles. Only l adult was born in Edgmond and 7 in Shropshire. 5 people own a video recorder, 2 own a microwave oven, 2 used solid fuel, the rest electricity. There is no gas. All have telephones, washing machines, radio and television. Last year 8 went abroad on holiday and 7 stayed in the UK. Food shopping is mainly done in Newport, some in Telford. The area includes over 40 houses on an estate. The Provost's house, partly medieval is owned by an American who runs a mail order firm in Bridgnorth.
